subject: Cumbre SimRacing collaboration
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

Firstable let me wish you a happy new year 2026. It has been a while from
the last time we talked about our professional collaboration, I just wanted
you to ensure cooperation with us in posting the announcement of our
partnership and the introduction of the Simsonn Award on Instagram.

Also remember that we need to have access to the raw assets of the Plus X
and Pro X Ultra as videos and pictures if you want to have a proper
spotlight during the promotion of your brand in the championship, so
please, provide us with any material you want us to include in the
promotion.

We pretend to begin the campaign the next week, so we´ll be grateful with
your agility.

Thanks for attending; we´re looking forward to your answer.
Santi Concepción, Cumbre Sim Racing´s CEO.
